items.title: 'They're survivors': Brother of 2 Israeli hostages fights for their return
items.description: Liran Berman, whose twin brothers Gali and Ziv Berman are hostages who may still be alive, spoke to ABC News Live on Tuesday.

items.title: WATCH:  Near-supermoon lights up American skies
items.description: Time-lapse imagery captured the nearly full moon, a forerunner to the harvest supermoon, rising and setting over U.S. cities.
